DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety tolerability Anti-MIF Antibody subject lupus nephritis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Anti-Macrophage Migration Inhibitory Factor ( Anti-MIF ) Antibody Lupus Nephritis
DOC.criteria: Signed date write informed consent obtain subject Males female age 18 year old time screen Established diagnosis systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) accord American College Rheumatology classification criterion Documented renal biopsy evidence proliferative glomerulonephritis prior screen Urine proteintocreatinine ratio > 0.5 ( mg/mg ) Any significant health problem lupus lupus nephritis
